014package org.jdbi.v3.core.argument.internal;
015
016import java.util.Map;
017import java.util.Objects;
018import java.util.Optional;
019import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
020
021import org.jdbi.v3.core.argument.Argument;
022import org.jdbi.v3.core.argument.Arguments;
023import org.jdbi.v3.core.argument.NamedArgumentFinder;
024import org.jdbi.v3.core.statement.StatementContext;
025import org.jdbi.v3.core.statement.UnableToCreateStatementException;
026
027/**
028 * Base {@link NamedArgumentFinder} implementation that can be used when binding properties of an object, with an
029 * optional prefix.
030 */
031public abstract class ObjectPropertyNamedArgumentFinder implements NamedArgumentFinder {
032    private final String prefix;
033    protected final Object obj;
034
035    private final Map<String, Optional<NamedArgumentFinder>> childArgumentFinders = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
036
037    /**
038     * @param prefix an optional prefix (we insert a '.' as a separator)
039     * @param obj the object bind on
040     */
041    protected ObjectPropertyNamedArgumentFinder(String prefix, Object obj) {
042        this.prefix = prefix == null || prefix.isEmpty() ? "" : prefix + ".";
043        this.obj = obj;
044    }
045
046    @Override
047    public final Optional<Argument> find(String name, StatementContext ctx) {
048        if (name.startsWith(prefix)) {
049            final String actualName = name.substring(prefix.length());
050
051            int separator = actualName.indexOf('.');
052
053            if (separator != -1) {
054                String parentName = actualName.substring(0, separator);
055                String childName = actualName.substring(separator + 1);
056
057                return childArgumentFinders
058                    .computeIfAbsent(parentName.endsWith("?") ? parentName.substring(0, parentName.length() - 1) : parentName, pn ->
059                        getValue(pn, ctx).map(typedValue -> getValueNested(typedValue, parentName, childName)))
060                    .flatMap(arg -> arg.find(childName, ctx));
061            }
062
063            return getValue(actualName, ctx)
064                .map(tv -> ctx.findArgumentFor(tv.getType(), tv.getValue())
065                    .orElseThrow(() -> new UnableToCreateStatementException(
066                        String.format("No argument factory registered for type [%s] for element [%s] on [%s]",
067                            tv.getType(),
068                            name,
069                            obj),
070                        ctx)));
071        }
072
073        return Optional.empty();
074    }
075
076    private NamedArgumentFinder getValueNested(TypedValue typedValue, String parentName, String childName) {
077        if (Objects.nonNull(typedValue.getValue())) {
078            return getNestedArgumentFinder(typedValue);
079        }
080        if (parentName.endsWith("?")) {
081            return (n, c) -> Optional.of(c.getConfig(Arguments.class).getUntypedNullArgument());
082        }
083        throw new IllegalArgumentException(
084            String.format("Trying to bind nested argument [%s], but found null value at [%s], may mark it as an optional with [%s]",
085                childName,
086                parentName,
087                parentName + '?'));
088    }
089
090    protected abstract Optional<TypedValue> getValue(String name, StatementContext ctx);
091    protected abstract NamedArgumentFinder getNestedArgumentFinder(TypedValue obj);
092}
